name: Floowandereeze & Stri
effectText: If this face-up card would leave the field, banish it instead. You can only use each of the following effects of "Floowandereeze & Stri" once per turn, and cannot Special Summon during the turn you activate either effect. If this card is Normal Summoned: You can target 1 card in either GY; banish it, then immediately after this effect resolves, you can Normal Summon 1 Winged Beast monster. If a Winged Beast monster is Normal Summoned to your field while this card is banished: You can add this card to your hand.
